Alvin ChowLevel 2. RookieAnswered on 11 Jul 2018Plenty. One example was Envictus. Even billionaire and F&B veteran, Sam Goi, is a substantial shareholder. But end up one of their investments was a fraud - Yamada Green Resources which is also a listco on the SGX. Lost about 30%.0 comments0
